title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option is not always available. This behavior is observed in the Navigator. Notes:
OB: The Open/Close project option is not always available when both P1 and P2 are selected.
EB: Either both should have the Open/Close project option available, or neither of them should have it enabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create two projects named P1 and P2. 2. Select project P2. 3. Attempt to close project P2.
